Articles.Content:
...........

Edited October 25, 2015 by musicpenguin

I'm not sure how i can summarize it all, .21 was released? And i remember you.

And you probably don't wanna do #4.

1.) Mun has craters in craters

2.) Hai thar!

3.) Nope, I'm one of #2.

4.) Chocolate anything. But don't do it anyway. Can't Kerbal while dead.

1. Same old same old. New update. New mods. New threads.

2. Hellouuu.

3. Sure, Mr. Gentlecat

4. Laugh yourself to death.

1. Procedual Fuel Tanks! Procedual Wings! Procedual Fairings!

2. Hi!

3. Possibly

4. Explode from the heart out

1. .21, KerbTown Mod, Procedural mods, Universe Replacer

2. Not sure if I'm new to you or not, but HI!

3. No, but that's ok, get to know you now.

4. Usually pills, but as someone who actually has those thoughts on a frequent basis I ask please don't, if I can get thru it you can too.

1. Everybody now has favourite Kerbals

2. Hi!

3. No.

4. Lithobrake.

1. Update. It's awesome.

2. I'm not new...

3. I remember you. Enigma thread, I believe. Ah, those were the days.

4. Why would you do that? I don't want you to do that.

1. Update, Procedural stuffs, KSO development courtesy of helldiver (excited for that one) Kerbtown, etc.

2. Been here awhile

3. Nope, nice to meet you though!

4. Don't.
Didn't the great forum purge also happen this summer? Or was that last summer?
The great forum purge occurred in spring iirc

1. The 0.21.1 update! And new mods. Procedural doohickeys, explodey bits, and shenanigans.
  2. Not new by a long shot.
  3. Welcome back!
  4. Play KSP for 18 days straight with no sleep. But you have to keep launching.

1. UPDATE UPDATE UPDATE UPDATE larger prode cores and the skipper engine from the KSPX. Seats too

2. PARTS PARTS check it out

3. Space center overhaul

4. new mods
